story.hline: KL Rahul set to miss England tour, to go abroad for treatment
story.intro: The current India vice-captain is set to miss the entire tour and go to Germany for his injury treatment
story.seoHeadline: KL Rahul set to miss England tour, to go abroad for treatment

story.hline: Injured Rahul doubtful for Edgbaston Test
story.intro: The India opener, who had to be withdrawn from the T20I series against South Africa because of a groin strain, is not certain for the Edgbaston Test
story.seoHeadline: Injured KL Rahul doubtful for Edgbaston Test, India v England

coverImage.caption: The India opener, who had to be withdrawn from the T20I series against South Africa because of a groin strain, is not certain for the Edgbaston Test

story.hline: Physio Kamlesh Jain formally joins India support staff
story.intro: It has been learnt that a part of the support staff, barring Dravid, will leave for England on June 16 for the yet to be completed fifth Test
story.seoHeadline: Physio Kamlesh Jain formally joins India support staff

coverImage.caption: Part of the support staff, barring Dravid, will leave for England on June 16

story.hline: Umran Malik, Arshdeep Singh picked for SA T20Is; Rahul to lead
story.intro: Hardik Pandya, who returned to regular bowling duties in the IPL, is back in the T20I squad
story.seoHeadline: Umran Malik, Arshdeep Singh earn maiden India call-up for South Africa T20Is

coverImage.caption: Hardik returns to the India fold for the T20I series as well.

story.hline: The Umran Malik dilemma for India selectors
story.intro: The Chetan Sharma-led selection panel will meet virtually on Sunday (May 22) to pick the squads for the triple series of South Africa, Ireland and England, for both red-ball and white-ball matches
story.seoHeadline: The Umran Malik dilemma for India selectors

story.hline: India Test team to play warm-up match against Leicestershire
story.intro: While the Indian T20I team will be playing Ireland on June 26 and 28, the Indian red-ball team will be involved in the first class game on those days in Leicester
story.seoHeadline: India Test team to play warm-up match against Leicestershire

coverImage.caption: The Indian Test team will play a warm-up fixture in Leicester

story.hline: Rahane set to miss England tour; selectors to pick two squads
story.intro: KKR batter has suffered a serious Grade III hamstring injury and will be out of action for at least four weeks
story.seoHeadline: Rahane set to miss England tour; selectors set to pick two squads

coverImage.caption: Rahane has suffered a serious Grade III hamstring injury and will be out of action for at least four weeks.

story.hline: Fifth Test between England and India rescheduled to July 2022
story.intro: The concluding Test match will now be played at Edgbaston instead of Manchester
story.seoHeadline: Fifth Test between India and England rescheduled to July 2022

coverImage.caption: India will resume the Test series at 2-1

story.hline: Resurgent India rain on South Africa's parade
story.intro: South Africa have squandered their two chances to clinch the series as India fight back
story.seoHeadline: Resurgent India rain on South Africa's parade

story.hline: Live Cricket Score - India vs South Africa, 4th T20I
story.intro: Catch all the live updates of India vs South Africa, 4th T20I, Rajkot
story.seoHeadline: Live Cricket Score - India vs South Africa, 4th T20I

coverImage.caption: DK was in sublime touch tonight.

story.hline: Dinesh Karthik dazzles as India force series decider
story.intro: South Africa were bowled out for just 87 in the run chase of 170 as India levelled the series
story.seoHeadline: Dinesh Karthik dazzles as India force series decider

coverImage.caption: Dinesh Karthik registered his maiden T20I fifty

story.hline: Mumbai, Madhya Pradesh in control going into final day
story.intro: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 181, his second hundred of the match and joined an elite group of Mumbai batters
story.seoHeadline: Mumbai, Madhya Pradesh in control going into final day

coverImage.caption: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 181, his second hundred of the match and joined an elite group of Mumbai batters (Pic courtesy: Yashasvi Jaiswal)

story.hline: Stats: England now have top three totals in ODIs
story.intro: All the major records broken by England against Netherlands in the first ODI in Amsteleevn when they posted 498
story.seoHeadline: Stats: England now have top three totals in ODIs

story.hline: Buttler, Salt and Malan tons flatten Netherlands
story.intro: England recorded the highest ever ODI sore of 498 and defended it to pickup a thumping 232-run win in the three-match series opener
story.seoHeadline: Buttler, Salt and Malan tons flatten Netherlands

coverImage.caption: Salt and Malan laid a solid platform with their centuries.
